How to contact me

Looking for me? Email always works. The address is my last name at the domain of this blog. Instant Messenger works too; I’m gweezlebur on AIM. I’m usually on IRC on Freenode as ivey in #merb, among others. Or, come look for me on
  • Twitter
  • del.icio.us
  • LinkedIn
  • Flickr
  • Facebook

I’ve been known to pop into Second Life on occasion, and I have a Wii. Ping me for details.
